option1: Stop and Proceed when the way is clear

option1: Allow the motor cycle to use complete lane
option2: Allow the motor cycle to use only half of the lane
option3: Drive on the Shoulder beside the motorcycle
option4: Pass in the same lane where the motor cycle is driving

Question: When driving in traffic, it is safest to
option1: Drive with the flow of traffic

Question: Double Solid yellow lines painted down the middle of the road mean
option2: Passing is permitted in either direction
option4: Passing is not permitted in either direction

Question: When stopped by a police offer you should
option2: unbucle your seat belt and lower your window

option4: Get your paperwork ready before the office reaches

option1: Only if it is following you

option4: Look over your shoulder in the direction you plan to move
